summary: Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.
cast: Joakim Nätterqvist|Sofia Helin|Stellan Skarsgård|Michael Nyqvist|Mirja Turestedt|Morgan Alling|Sven-Bertil Taube|Bibi Andersson|Fanny Risberg|Gustaf Skarsgård|Simon Callow|Vincent Perez|Julia Dufvenius|Svante Martin|Jørgen Langhelle|Thomas W. Gabrielsson|Noa Samenius|Bisse Unger|Lina Englund|Donald Högberg|Charlotta Larsson|Douglas Johansson|Robert Sjöblom|Bo Wettergren|Annika Hallin|Christian Fiedler|Tomas Bolme|Josefin Ljungman|Nicklas Gustavsson|Karl Oscar Törnros|Ingmar Svensson|Mikael Hansson|Milind Soman|Steven Waddington|Nicholas Boulton|Driss Roukhe|Alex Wyndham|Frank Sieckel|Per Myrberg|Bryan Barter|Monique Carmona|Robert Löfgren|Elise Pärnänen
title: Arn: El caballero templario
